    • execute

      public void execute(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context, Map<String,Object> contextMap) throws ExecutionException
      Invoked by the Task Scanner whenever the task scanner is triggered by the scheduler
      Specified by:
      execute in interface ScheduledService
      Parameters:
      context - the Context to use for the request
      contextMap - Context information passed by the scheduler service
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if execution of the scheduled work failed. Implementations can also throw RuntimeExceptions which will get logged.
